snippet.title: The Inverse - Official Game Trailer | PS5
snippet.description:
It's coming, you'll see...

The Inverse - https://theinverse.co.uk

People start going missing, lighting starts to flicker, and the weather starts to turn. As soon as the staff realise what’s going on, they immediately evacuate the labs and prevent anyone from entering and anything from exiting. One problem though, they leave you inside… It’s your job to try to escape! Defend yourself against the creatures and destroy the FlipSide!
